mapper.sql: SEQ_ID, createuser, createtime, participant, relation, remark, usercode, participantcode, organization
mapper.insert:
insert into KQDS_PARTICIPANT
SEQ_ID,
createuser,
createtime,
participant,
relation,
remark,
usercode,
participantcode,
organization,

mapper.update:
update KQDS_PARTICIPANT
createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
participant = #{participant,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
relation = #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
participantcode = #{participantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update KQDS_PARTICIPANT set createuser = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, participant = #{participant,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, relation = #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usercode = #{usercode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, participantcode = #{participantcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organization = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SEQ_ID = #{seqId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select m.* from KQDS_PARTICIPANT m where 1=1 and usercode like '%' + #{usercode} + '%' ORDER BY m.CreateTime desc
